title: I was Gold 4 in preseason and my mate was Plat 5 in preseason. Why can't we duo placement matches?
body:
Reposting this here because I didn't get any replies in Help & Support.
Basically, we're both in placements but for some reason we can't duo. Anyone have any clue? It says "Ineligible duo partner" when we try to invite each other. This shouldn't be happening because I was Gold and he was Plat last season and yet we can't duo our provisional games.

replies.body:
plat last season or just preseason?
gold preseason? or also last season?
im guessing you made gold only in preseason while he was already plat at the end.

with the changes to provisionals, it first gets based on last seasons rankings. (you were silver last season....confirmed reason)
